title: Shop Swift E-Commerce App
description: A React e-commerce site that dynamically updates product listings and cart contents, facilitating seamless browsing and shopping. This React app keeps front end inventory in sync with live updates from backend changes and stores user state during page navigation.

title: Today I Learned
description: Today I Learned is a full stack React fact-sharing app. This app uses the backend data base 'Supabase' to store user's posts, sources, and likes. This app is responsive to all devices and has sort-by-category functionality

title: Far Away Travel Packing Planner
description: Convenient travel packing planner. This app has check-off functionality and uses organizational database to sort list by input order, description, or checked status.

title: Fair Share Bill Splitter
description: React app that helps you split the tab with your friends! This app keeps track of transaction history to determine how much one user owes another over time. This project also showcases conditional rendering of forms based on user input.
